title: table
description: a device with four legs and a flat surface.

title: chair
description: a seat for one person that has a back, usually four legs, and sometimes two arms.

title: comb
description: a flat piece of plastic, wood, or metal with a thin row of long, narrow parts along one side, used to tidy and arrange your hair.

title: paper
description: thin, flat material made from crushed wood or cloth, used for writing, printing, or drawing on.

title: smartphone
description: A pocket-sized computer that combines a mobile phone with internet access, a camera, and various apps.

title: Bottle
description: A container, usually made of glass or plastic, with a narrow neck for holding liquids.

title: Monitor
description: A display device that visually presents information from a computer.

title: month
description: a period of about four weeks, especially one of the twelve periods into which a year is divided.

title: Piano
description: A keyboard musical instrument with 88 keys, producing sounds through hammers striking strings.

title: Coat
description: An outer garment worn for warmth and protection from the elements.

title: Shirt
description: A garment worn on the upper body, typically with sleeves.

title: Ruler
description: A flat, straight tool used for measuring length or drawing straight lines.

title: Pen
description: A writing instrument that uses ink to create marks on paper.

title: Window
description: An opening in a wall or vehicle that allows light and air to pass through.

title: Cup
description: A small, open container used for drinking, typically made of ceramic, glass, or plastic.
